task.summary:
Start on GUI renderer
- Basic board layout (walls, corridors, rooms) - New game dialogs
Allow moving in and out of rooms
Split turn buttons into separate class
Improve code quality and performance of BoardCanvas
Move GUI components into separate package
Listen to Player property changes instead of canvas
Enable Suggest button when player moves into a room
Don't show eliminated players in rooms
Allow changing game setup from menu bar
Add button to take secret passage
Nicer colours (based on Base16 Atelier Health)
Fix player display not updating when game stopped
Add not null check - fix crash on startup
Fix game resetting when New Game dialog cancelled
Update take passage button when passage taken
Improve when Take Passage button is enabled/disabled
Add tooltips for players and rooms on board
Throw error when moving to the same space as another player
Neaten up animation methods in BoardCanvas

MESSAGE.value: Listen to Player property changes instead of canvas
Clean up and comment PlayerDisplay
Clean up and comment PlayerSetupPanel
Clean up and comment TurnButtons
Clean up and comment GUIRenderer
Enable Suggest button when player moves into a room
Don't show eliminated players in rooms
Fix popup dialog positioning
Improve suggestion chooser layout
Add second example file
Allow changing game setup from menu bar
Add button to take secret passage
Nicer colours (based on Base16 Atelier Health)
Fix player display not updating when game stopped
Add not null check - fix crash on startup
Fix game resetting when New Game dialog cancelled
Update take passage button when passage taken
Improve when Take Passage button is enabled/disabled
Remove tooltip delay
Add tooltips for players and rooms on board
Calculate move path in mouseMoved
Animate player movement
Throw error when moving to the same space as another player
Fix and simplify movement animations
Neaten up animation methods in BoardCanvas

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Neaten up animation methods in BoardCanvas
